mapper.insert: insert into maker(maker_name, maker_phone, maker_intro,mem_idx) values(#{maker_name}, #{maker_phone},#{maker_intro},#{mem_idx})
mapper.update: update member set mem_type=1 where mem_idx=#{mem_idx}
mapper.select: select count(*) from maker where mem_idx=#{mem_idx}
select mak.maker_idx from maker as mak, (select pro_id, mem_idx, maker_idx from project where pro_id=#{pro_id}) as pro where mak.maker_idx = pro.maker_idx
